roadmap.title: ACI Meta Coach - Official Roadmap
roadmap.vision: ACI Meta Coach unifies artificial intelligence, psychology, and finance inside a single ecosystem. The ambition: help every user become autonomous, aware, and in control of their performance within a secure, intelligent, community-driven environment.

items.title: Building the ACI Ecosystem
items.description: Design the ACI Meta Coach identity, develop the official site, and create the ACI token (ERC-20) on Ethereum. Goal: lay the technical and visual foundations before launch.

items.title: AI Coach Launch (v1)
items.description: First version of the ACI AI Coach, able to analyse voice, tone, and user consistency. The AI becomes a real personal assistant that boosts discipline, confidence, and emotional balance.
objectives: Emotional AI (voice, tone, stress) for real-time coaching
Basic concierge: reminders, agenda, simple automations
Business Finder (web demo): 3 tailored ideas + first action plans
Trading Coach AI (discipline, routines, execution checklists)

items.title: Intelligent Training + Meta Track
items.description: Launch interactive AI trainings for crypto, trading, security, and psychology. Meta Track analyses progress and adapts content to each profile. Advanced modules unlock through ACI staking.
objectives: Meta Track: AI progression tracking, XP, routines
Staking integration to unlock ACI modules

items.title: DAO + International Expansion
items.description: Launch the ACI DAO so token holders can vote and steer strategic decisions. Deploy the AI Coach worldwide with translated trainings.

items.title: ACI Metaverse & Advanced AI
items.description: Create an immersive ACI world where users interact with their AI Coach inside a virtual learning universe. Performance unlocks progression badges and advanced access tiers.

items.title: Global AI Companion App (R&D ‚Üí Beta)
items.description: Develop a wellbeing and trading AI companion app focused on emotional support. Users can enable camera/mic to talk to the AI when stress, fear, or panic appears. The AI listens, observes, and suggests tailored routines with no unconsented data storage.
objectives: SOS mode: stress alerts, priority tasks, anchors
Concierge: booking, travel, meetings, notes, partners
Business Finder ‚Üí interactive 90-day plan (goals, tasks, KPIs)
Meta Track + Trading plan integration (emotional routines)
Closed beta + user feedback, security & compliance

items.title: Public Launch of the AI App
items.description: Official release of the app on stores (iOS / Android / desktop). Full integration with the ACI ecosystem (token, staking, Meta Track). Wellbeing partnerships and collaborations with educational institutions.
objectives: Multi-track routines: business, trading, mindset, concierge
Service/AI marketplace linked to the coach

hero.title: Intelligent Training
hero.intro: Interactive tracks blending video and AI: crypto, forex, risk management, and trading psychology. Unlock premium modules with the Meta Coach Token (ACI).
hero.stakingLine: By staking your ACI Tokens, you access an AI-guided training journey that evolves with you.

modules.title: Trader Psychology
modules.description: Routines, emotional discipline, and mindset coaching to stay aligned with your plan.

iaSection.heading: Here the program adapts to you ‚Äî not the other way around.
iaSection.paragraph1: ACI AI analyses your progress, spots strengths, and automatically adjusts video sequences, quizzes, and live workshops. The more ACI you stake, the more your AI unlocks advanced levels and insights, opening premium modules and targeted coaching.
iaSection.paragraph2: The Meta Coach Token is the access key: stake your ACI, activate 24/7 tracking, and let the platform suggest your next best step. Learning becomes intelligent, interactive, and fully personalised ‚Äî your performance indicators constantly feed the AI engine that evolves your journey.
bullets: Adaptive learning that observes your behaviour and adjusts in real time.
Voice feedback, mental routines, and emotional tracking delivered by Meta Coach AI.
Automatic evolution of your content, challenges, and rewards.

steps.title: 1. Stake your ACI
steps.description: Connect your wallet, lock your tokens, and activate the intelligent training.

steps.title: 2. AI calibration
steps.description: The ACI engine evaluates your level and selects the first tailored modules.

steps.title: 3. Living journey
steps.description: Follow videos, test your knowledge, and receive instant AI feedback.

steps.title: 4. Active rewards
steps.description: Earn badges, perks, and deeper access as your results improve.

ecosystem.title: AI + Trading + Mindset: the winning equation.
ecosystem.paragraph1: Each track combines video content, AI feedback, and live coach sessions. Use your ACI to activate advanced modules, unlock live workshops, and access upcoming Meta Track routines.
ecosystem.paragraph2: The entire ecosystem is connected: your staking fuels learning, which unlocks rewards that accelerate your progress. Meta Coach AI acts like an evolving personal coach, capturing voice, emotional, and behavioural signals to tailor every session. Every learner helps train the collective ACI AI ‚Äî the more the community practices, the sharper the recommendations become.

faqPage.title: ACI Meta Coach FAQ
faqPage.intro: The answers to the most common questions about the AI Coach, the trainings, and the Meta Coach Token. No hype, just transparency.

items.question: Does the AI Coach replace a human trader?
items.answer: No. ACI Meta Coach provides analytics and routines, but you stay in control. The AI augments your skills‚Äîit doesn‚Äôt give financial advice or open positions for you.

items.question: What does the Meta Coach Token (ACI) unlock?
items.answer: It grants AI Coach credits, discounts on trainings, staking rewards, and eventually DAO governance. It is the fuel of the entire ecosystem.

items.question: Can I test the training journeys before buying ACI?
items.answer: Yes. The discovery access includes video excerpts and free templates. To activate the full journeys and Meta Track follow-up, you need to hold the required ACI threshold.

items.question: Is staking available to everyone?
items.answer: Staking is open to Meta Coach Token holders who meet the minimum amount. It rewards long-term commitments and secures ecosystem liquidity.

items.question: Does the ecosystem provide financial advice?
items.answer: Never. We deliver educational support, tools, and personalised monitoring, but every investor remains responsible for their decisions and risk management.

faqPage.moreQuestions: Have a specific question? Reach out via the Contact page‚Äîwe answer within 24 hours.

roadmapPage.title: ACI Meta Coach - Official Roadmap

disclaimerText: Always do your own research. Nothing here is financial advice.
copyright: ¬© 2025 ACI Meta Coach. All rights reserved.
aboutMissionDesc: ACI is an innovative cryptocurrency built on two pillars: an untraceable payment method and exclusive crypto training. In a world where digital transaction surveillance is pervasive, ACI offers a private and fully free payment solution, empowering users to reclaim financial autonomy.
aboutOriginDesc: The ACI project was born in 2024 from a simple observation: crypto payment solutions are becoming less discreet and less educational. ACI was therefore designed to combine anonymity, continuous training, and real utility within a secure and accessible ecosystem.
aboutCommitmentPoints: Launch of an untraceable payment system based on ACI
Access to full training once a certain ACI token threshold is reached
Audited smart contracts and absolute transparency
An identified founder and a united community
aboutCommunityDesc: ACI is not just another crypto: it‚Äôs a new Web3 vision where every holder becomes an active participant. Thanks to our training system, users holding a certain amount of tokens can access exclusive courses on trading, security, and cryptocurrencies. Together, let‚Äôs build a secure, free, and educational alternative for tomorrow‚Äôs world.
tokenomicsDesc: Here are the full details on ACI token distribution, total supply, allocations, etc.
raiseGoalText: We aim to raise {{amount}} to fully fund the ACI project.
founderRemunerationText: As founder, a remuneration of {{percent}} is allocated to cover development, strategic direction, branding, management, and full project creation.

fundAllocationPoints.text: Technical development (smart contracts, security, web infrastructure, AI)
Legal fees (lawyers, legal registration, potential litigation)

tokenSupplyText: The total number of ACI tokens minted is {{total}}. They will be distributed under strict rules to ensure transparency and stability.
howtoStepsTitle: Steps to Buy ACI Meta Coach

howtoSteps.text: Connect your wallet via the top button
Select the USD amount to invest
Confirm the transaction in your wallet

howtoFaq.question: Can I buy with a credit card?

howtoSecurity: Only buy on the official site: acipresale.com
Always verify the smart contract address before transacting.

faqItems.question: What is the price of ACI during the presale?
Can I participate from any country?
faqItems.answer: Yes, the project is open internationally (except in crypto-restricted countries).

faqItems.question: Where will my ACI be stored after purchase?
faqItems.answer: Directly in your wallet address, no intermediaries.

faqItems.question: Are ACI tokens transferable immediately?
faqItems.answer: ACI will be transferable after presale ends or at official listing.

faqItems.question: Can I resell my ACI later?
faqItems.answer: Yes, once listed on a DEX/CEX, you can freely resell them.

faqItems.question: Is there a minimum or maximum purchase?
faqItems.answer: Recommended minimum: $10 ‚Äî No maximum (while supplies last).

faqItems.question: Can I buy from mobile?
faqItems.answer: Yes, via MetaMask or TrustWallet Mobile.

faqItems.question: Can I purchase with a credit card?

stakingDesc: Stake your ACI tokens to earn passive rewards. The longer you stake, the more you earn.
stakingConnectPrompt: Connect your wallet to access ACI staking.
stakingWrongNetwork: Switch your wallet to {{network}} before staking ACI.
stakingNetworkMismatch: Wrong network ‚Äî connect to Ethereum Mainnet.
stakingConfigErrorContract: Invalid staking contract address. Check REACT_APP_STAKING_CONTRACT_ADDRESS.
stakingConfigErrorToken: Invalid ACI token address. Check REACT_APP_STAKING_TOKEN_ADDRESS.
stakingError: Something went wrong. Please try again or check your wallet.
stakingApprovePrompt: Approve the staking contract to use your ACI before depositing.
stakingApproveSuccess: Approval confirmed. You can stake your ACI now.
stakingStakeSuccess: Staking confirmed! Your ACI is now earning rewards.
stakingUnstakeSuccess: Unstake completed. Your ACI is back in your wallet.
stakingInsufficientAmount: Enter an amount above zero (and meet the minimum).
stakingSignerMissing: Wallet not ready to sign transactions. Reconnect and try again.
stakingPoolInvalid: Selected staking pool is not supported.
stakingContractBalanceWarning: Rewards pool only holds {{balance}} ACI. Pending rewards may be delayed until it is refilled.

coach3d.title: AI Coach (3D Avatar)
coach3d.subtitle: Talk with your AI coach in real time. The 3D avatar reacts to your voice and emotions.
coach3d.noConversation: Start the conversation to see messages here.
coach3d.promptFallback: Microphone recognition is unavailable. Type your message to ask the coach:

error.sttUnsupported: Speech recognition is not supported in this browser. Use the text field below to chat.
error.ttsUnsupported: Voice playback is blocked in this browser. Switch to Chrome, Edge, or Safari over HTTPS and allow speech synthesis to hear the coach.
error.generic: The coach is unavailable. Please try again later.
error.microDenied: Microphone not available. Allow access in your browser settings.
error.avatarLoad: 3D avatar unavailable. A simplified visualization is displayed.
error.cameraUnavailable: Camera control is managed by the emotion detection module. Enable it from the detection card.

desc.highStress: a lot of tension in your voice

calm: Breathe, I'm staying by your side.
energetic: I can feel that spark in you.
neutral: Thanks for sharing that with me.
I'm noting every nuance you're expressing.

guidance.stress: Let's take 20 seconds together: inhale for 4 counts, hold for 2, exhale slowly for 6. As you breathe out, picture the pressure leaving.
guidance.fear: Let's identify what worries you: write down the scenario you fear and note beside it what you truly control.
guidance.sadness: I sense your energy is lower. Allow yourself a conscious pause: breathe, stretch, then list three micro wins from recently, even tiny ones.
guidance.confidence: Let's rebuild your confidence: recall a time you held steady despite doubt and break down what made the difference.
guidance.motivation: When motivation dips, return to your core intention. Choose a ten-minute action that rekindles your why.
guidance.focus: Let's tighten your focus: state your goal in one sentence, block a 30-minute slot, and remove one key distraction.
guidance.anger: I feel the tension. Quickly write what triggered you, then translate each complaint into a concrete need or boundary.
guidance.gratitude: Thank you for sharing. Anchor that gratitude: name a person or insight you want to honor in your next step.

followUp.stress: What's the main source of that tension for you right now?
followUp.fear: What's the first concrete action you can take to ease that concern?
followUp.sadness: Which of those wins could you extend this week?
followUp.confidence: What lever from that experience can you reuse now?
followUp.motivation: Which mini-action would give you momentum right after our exchange?
followUp.focus: Which distraction can you neutralize now to protect that 30-minute plan?
followUp.anger: What boundary will you set to stay aligned without exploding?
followUp.gratitude: How could you celebrate that gratitude in the next 24 hours?

guidanceFallback.stress: Let's slow down together: take a deep breath in, hold for two seconds, then exhale gently. When you're ready, tell me what would help release the pressure.
guidanceFallback.positive: Let's harness that momentum: how can you turn this positive feeling into a concrete action today?
guidanceFallback.gratitude: Let's keep this gratitude as an anchor. Which next step would extend that state?
guidanceFallback.default: I'm here to support you step by step. What would you like to clarify first?

followUpFallback.question: What concrete answer would help you move forward calmly?
followUpFallback.statement: Which next step do you want to engage right after this share?

reflection.question: You're asking: ‚Äú{{text}}‚Äù.
reflection.empty: Tell me more: how exactly are you feeling?
reflection.liveSync: I'm synced with your emotional state in real time, let's stay aligned.

outro.calm: I'm staying here at your pace.
outro.energetic: Let's keep this momentum, I'm with you.

ui.title: Emotion detection module (voice + camera)
ui.description: Real-time voice analysis to help you adapt: dominant emotion, stress, confidence, speech rhythm and filler words. Enable the camera for facial emotion tracking (data processed locally).
ui.voiceHint: Live voice insights for adaptive coaching.

toggle.tooltipSession: Stop the session before changing video analysis.

consent.title: Microphone permission required
consent.description: Allow microphone access to launch emotion detection. Audio stays on this device‚Äîonly the computed metrics are displayed.

preSession.intro: Everything is ready. Click start and speak exactly as in a real situation. You can stop anytime to review the summary.

session.title: Live session
session.description: Metrics refresh every 750 ms for a smooth experience.
session.voiceInsightsHint: I analyse tone, energy and stability to support you in real time.

summary.title: Session summary
summary.restartNote: Data remains in your browser. Restart the module whenever you like.

chart.empty: No data recorded for this session.

errors.micDenied: Microphone access denied. Check your browser permissions.
errors.cameraDenied: Camera access denied. Update your browser permissions.
errors.videoModelsFailed: Unable to load the video analysis models.
errors.videoFallback: Camera could not be activated. Switching to voice-only mode.
errors.voiceAiFallback: AI voice analysis unavailable. Using local metrics instead.

coachCue.highStress: Take 10 seconds to breathe, drop your shoulders and resume at a calmer pace.
coachCue.lowConfidenceFillers: State your core idea in one sentence before continuing.
coachCue.energetic: Great energy! Push one argument for two minutes.
coachCue.lowConfidence: Take two deep breaths, focus on your key message before you continue.
coachCue.balanced: Keep this clear tone. Follow your plan step by step.

voiceSummary.awaiting: I‚Äôm listening‚Äîkeep speaking for a complete analysis.
voiceSummary.highStressLowConfidence: High tension detected: slow down, reset and resume.
voiceSummary.highStress: Lots of energy! Channel it by clarifying your next point.
voiceSummary.highConfidence: Stable, confident voice‚Äîperfect to deliver your plan.
voiceSummary.lowConfidence: Calm but hesitant: craft your next point in a strong sentence.
voiceSummary.highPitch: Pitch rising‚Äîslow down and breathe for clarity.
voiceSummary.balanced: Balanced delivery: keep this rhythm and emphasise key ideas.

advice.reset: Create a short reset ritual (breathing, grounding) before your next session.
advice.intention: Write your intention in one sentence and say it aloud before starting.
advice.pause: Practise conscious pauses‚Äîstop whenever a filler word comes.
advice.slowDown: Train yourself to slow down by reading a short passage slowly.
advice.challenge: Challenge: explain a complex idea in 120 seconds next time.
advice.structure: Use ‚ÄúSituation - Action - Result‚Äù to keep your speech structured.
advice.setup: Choose a calm environment and test your microphone ahead of time.

fallback.title: Static mode
